project_plan.name: Word Frequency Counter in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that reads a text file and counts the frequency of each word, displaying the top 10 most common words in the terminal.

task.name: Implement a function to read a text file and store its contents.
Implement a function to count the frequency of each word in the text.
Implement a function to identify the top 10 most common words.
Implement a function to display the top 10 words in the terminal.
Write tests for each of the functions implemented above.
Execute tests to ensure all functionalities work correctly.
